children.name: SDN Monitor
description: Full stack application for monitoring and managing the software defined switches, switch controllers and hosts.
D3JS, AngularJS, NodeJS, CoffeScript, Sass, Jade, Mocha, Karma Runner is used in this project.

children.name: Taxi Share App
description: Full-stack service is developed for a location based taxi ride sharing application.
Server-side is developed with NodeJS and MongoDB is used as database.
Web client is developed with AngularJS.

children.name: Flight Simulator
description: Communication interface simulator is developed for Atak Helicopter and Anka Unmanned Vehicle with C#.

children.name: VTPS
description: Video Tracking Pibal System(VTPS) is a device that produces metro report before launching a rocket or artillery missile or produces a weather report for meteorology.
UI interface of the system is developed using C#.

children.name: EJDER
description: Electric system developed for the 6x6 amphibian armoured vehicle using C and an embedded device
Vehicle CAN Network simulator is developed using C#.
